short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun Snake game in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snake is a video game where you control a moving snake that gets longer each time it eats food items appearing randomly on the screen. The challenge comes from avoiding collisions with walls and the snake's own growing body while trying to collect as much food as possible. The game ends if the snake hits a wall or itself. Players control the snake's direction (up, down, left, right), but cannot stop its continuous movement.
